title: Where is The Next Call of Duty? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.27.20
description:
Blessing and Tim talk about a bunch of leaks! A leaked Xbox Series X controller, leaked Nintedo source code, and Call of Duty Black Ops Cold War leaking all over the place. 

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:30 - Housekeeping
It’s Major Nelson week on Kinda Funny!
Thursday, join Greg and Major Nelson for We Have Cool Friends.
Friday, Major Nelson joins Greg for Kinda Funny Games Daily.
Saturday, Major Nelson joins Snowbike Mike, Gary Whitta, and Alanah Pearce for the Kinda Funny Xcast.
That all is going down right here on Twitch, youtube.com/KindaFunny, Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames, and podcast services around the globe.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:05:14 - Has a Lockhart Controller leaked? - Tom Warren @ The Verge
00:16:55 - Could this be the rumored Series S controller? Could this be a hint that there will be a handful of colors to choose from at launch for the new controller design?  - Best Friends Q:The Nano Biologist
00:20:12 - Could Kojima be working on a new horror game? - Jordan Gerblick @ GamesRadar
00:29:15 - Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War has been leaked on a Doritos bag - Sammy Barker @ Pushsquare
00:38:40 - Persona 5 Scramble is officially confirmed for the West - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:40:32 - A fun one: Super Mario 64 Source Code has Leaked and Luigi is REAL - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:48:00 -  Brooklinen
00:48:40 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:50:30 - It seems like this is the first time, in a long time, that Sony has pushed a brand new game to PS+ rather than letting it hit the market place. Do you think this is testing the waters to what Xbox has been doing with day one releases on game pass? Or are they just giving us a new game late on the generation to keep us hooked into their ecosystem? - Frankfurtter
00:55:00 - Squad Up:Ryley Annabelle (PS4) Redd-Velvette
00:57:30 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Blessing and Imran
